trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when an ooze-folk is in plain sight, it takes a {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to spot an ooze-folk that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the ooze-folk's space while unaware of the ooze-folk is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} by the ooze-folk.

trait.name: Fragile Bones
entries: For each 5 damage it takes, the ooze-folk's walking speed is reduced by 5 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ooze folk makes one glass longsword attack and one pseudopod attack.

action.name: Glass Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage. If a 1 is rolled on an attack roll with a glass longsword, it shatters and can no longer be used.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) acid damage.
